title: Revenue of Sonic Corporation in the U.S. from 2009 to 2018
summary: The statistic depicts the annual Revenue of Sonic Corporation from 2009 to 2018 .
In 2018 , Sonic Corporation ' Revenue amounted to around 423.59 million U.S. dollars .
After spin-offs of other product segments , Koninklijke Sonic Corporation N.V. today is a company focused on healthcare/medical technology .
gold: This statistic shows the revenue of Sonic Corporation in the United States from 2009 to 2018.
In 2018 , Sonic Corp. generated a revenue of 423.59 million U.S. dollars.
Sonic Corporation , founded in Oklahoma , United States in 1953 , is a drive-in fast-food restaurant chain .
